name: Cornered Rocket
description:
You are a rocket, and you have to avoid dying to the closing border, while avoiding explosions and collecting targets to give yourself more time.

Developed for the BenBonk Game Jam #2.

Font used is Kenney Mini from Kenney Fonts.

Source code is available at GitHub.

Controls:

  • Turning: Arrow Keys / D-Pad / Analog Stick
  • Boosting: Spacebar / Z / X / C / Any Action Button on Gamepad
  • Pausing: Escape (on executables) / P / Start / Select
